description: End users may experience loss of connectivity when utilizing Internet Connection Sharing (ICS) following updates related to CVE-2023-35630. This symptom is particularly evident in Windows Server environments, including builds 10.0.19041.3803 and 10.0.22000.2652, among others. The updates released under KB5033379, KB5033375, and others aim to mitigate remote code execution flaws but have been reported to disrupt ICS functionality, potentially leading to inability to connect to shared network resources, affecting operations for systems reliant on this service.
